SELECT content_seq.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO content_table(content_idx, content_subject, content_text, content_file, content_writer_idx, content_board_idx, content_date) VALUES(#{content_idx}, #{content_subject}, #{content_text}, #{content_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content_writer_idx}, #{content_board_idx}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT c.content_idx, c.content_subject, u.user_name content_writer_name, TO_CHAR(c.content_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') content_date FROM content_table c, user_table u WHERE c.content_writer_idx = u.user_idx AND c.content_board_idx = #{c.board_info_idx} ORDER BY c.content_idx desc

SELECT u.user_name content_writer_name, TO_CHAR(content_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') content_date, c.content_subject, c.content_text, c.content_file FROM content_table c, user_table u WHERE c.content_writer_idx = u.user_idx AND c.content_idx = ${content_idx}
